displayName: Microsoft Sentinel Process Event ASim schema
description: The Microsoft Sentinel process events normalized table stores events using the Process Event ASIM normalized schema associated with creation or termination of a process.
icmTeam: Microsoft Azure Sentinel/Data Collection and Processing

tables.name: ASimProcessEventLogs
tables.description: The Microsoft Sentinel process events normalized table stores events using the Process Event ASIM normalized schema associated with creation or termination of a process. Such events are reported by operating systems and security systems, such as EDR (End Point Detection and Response) systems.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information, represented using key and value pairs provided by the source which do not map to ASim.

columns.name: EventMessage
columns.description: A general message or description.

columns.name: EventCount
columns.description: The number of events described by the record.

columns.name: EventStartTime
columns.description: The time in which the event started. If the source supports aggregation and the record represents multiple events, the time that the first event was generated. If not provided by the source record, this field aliases the TimeGenerated field.

columns.name: EventEndTime
columns.description: The time in which the event ended. If the source supports aggregation and the record represents multiple events, the time that the last event was generated. If not provided by the source record, this field aliases the TimeGenerated field.

columns.name: EventType
columns.description: Describes the operation reported by the record

columns.name: EventSubType
columns.description: Describes a subdivision of the operation reported in the EventType field.

columns.name: EventResult
columns.description: The outcome of the event, represented by one of the following values: Success, Partial, Failure, NA (Not Applicable). The value may not be provided directly by the sources, in which case it is derived from other event fields, for example, the EventResultDetails field.

columns.name: EventResultDetails
columns.description: Reason or details for the result reported in the EventResult field.

columns.name: EventOriginalUid
columns.description: A unique ID of the original record, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalType
columns.description: The original event type or ID, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalSubType
columns.description: The original event subtype or ID, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalResultDetails
columns.description: The original result details provided by the source.

columns.name: EventSeverity
columns.description: The severity of the event. Valid values are: Informational, Low, Medium, or High.

columns.name: EventOriginalSeverity
columns.description: The original severity as provided by the reporting device.

columns.name: EventProduct
columns.description: The product generating the event.

columns.name: EventProductVersion
columns.description: The version of the product generating the event.

columns.name: EventVendor
columns.description: The vendor of the product generating the event.

columns.name: EventSchemaVersion
columns.description: The version of the schema.

columns.name: EventOwner
columns.description: The owner of the event, which is usually the department or subsidiary in which it was generated.

columns.name: EventReportUrl
columns.description: A URL provided in the event for a resource that provides more information about the event.

columns.name: DvcIpAddr
columns.description: The IP Address of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcHostname
columns.description: The hostname of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcDomain
columns.description: The domain of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcDomainType
columns.description: The type of DvcDomain. Possible values include "Windows" and "FQDN".

columns.name: DvcFQDN
columns.description: The hostname of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcDescription
columns.description: A descriptive text associated with the device.

columns.name: DvcId
columns.description: The unique ID of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcIdType
columns.description: The type of DvcId.

columns.name: DvcMacAddr
columns.description: The MAC address of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcZone
columns.description: The network on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcOs
columns.description: The operating system running on the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcOsVersion
columns.description: The version of the operating system on the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcAction
columns.description: For reporting security systems, the action taken by the system.

columns.name: DvcOriginalAction
columns.description: The original DvcAction as provided by the reporting device.

columns.name: DvcInterface
columns.description: The network interface on which data was captured.

columns.name: DvcScopeId
columns.description: The cloud platform scope ID the device belongs to. DvcScopeId map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: DvcScope
columns.description: The cloud platform scope the device belongs to. DvcScope map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: ActorUserId
columns.description: A machine-readable, alphanumeric, unique representation of the actor.

columns.name: ActorUserIdType
columns.description: The type of the ID stored in the ActorUserId field.

columns.name: ActorScopeId
columns.description: The scope ID, such as Azure AD tenant ID, in which ActorUserId and ActorUsername are defined.

columns.name: ActorScope
columns.description: The scope, such as Azure AD tenant, in which ActorUserId and ActorUsername are defined.

columns.name: ActorUsername
columns.description: The Actor's username, including domain information when available.

columns.name: ActorUsernameType
columns.description: The type of the Actor's username specified in ActionUsername field

columns.name: ActorUserType
columns.description: The type of the Actor.

columns.name: ActorOriginalUserType
columns.description: The user type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ActorSessionId
columns.description: The unique ID of the sign-in session of the Actor.

columns.name: TargetUserId
columns.description: A machine-readable, alphanumeric, unique representation of the actor.

columns.name: TargetUserIdType
columns.description: The type of the ID stored in the TargetUserId field.

columns.name: TargetScopeId
columns.description: The scope ID, such as Azure AD tenant ID, in which TargetUserId and TargetUsername are defined.

columns.name: TargetScope
columns.description: The scope, such as Azure AD tenant, in which TargetUserId and TargetUsername are defined.

columns.name: TargetUsername
columns.description: The Target actor's username, including domain information when available.

columns.name: TargetUsernameType
columns.description: The type of the Target actor's username specified in TargetUsername field

columns.name: TargetUserType
columns.description: The type of the Target actor.

columns.name: TargetOriginalUserType
columns.description: The user type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: TargetUserSessionId
columns.description: The unique ID of the sign-in session of the Target actor.

columns.name: TargetUserSessionGuid
columns.description: The unique guid of the sign-in session of the Target actor.

columns.name: ActingProcessCommandLine
columns.description: The command line used to run the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessName
columns.description: The name of the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileCompany
columns.description: The company that created the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileDescription
columns.description: The description embedded in the version information of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileProduct
columns.description: The product name from the version information in the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileVersion
columns.description: The product version from the version information of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileInternalName
columns.description: The product internal file name from the version information of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileOriginalName
columns.description: The product original file name from the version information of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessFilename
columns.description: The product file name from the version information of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessIsHidden
columns.description: An indication of whether the acting process is in hidden mode.

columns.name: ActingProcessInjectedAddress
columns.description: The memory address in which the responsible acting process is stored.

columns.name: ActingProcessId
columns.description: The process ID of the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessGuid
columns.description: A GUID of the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessIntegrityLevel
columns.description: Integrity Level for acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessMD5
columns.description: The MD5 hash of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessSHA1
columns.description: The SHA-1 hash of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessSHA256
columns.description: The SHA-256 hash of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessSHA512
columns.description: The SHA-512 hash of the acting process image file.

columns.name: ActingProcessIMPHASH
columns.description: The Import Hash of all the library DLLs that are used by the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessCreationTime
columns.description: The date and time when the acting process was started.

columns.name: ActingProcessTokenElevation
columns.description: A token indicating the presence or absence of User Access Control (UAC) privilege elevation applied to the acting process.

columns.name: ActingProcessFileSize
columns.description: The size of the file in bytes that ran the acting process.

columns.name: ParentProcessName
columns.description: The name of the parent process.

columns.name: ParentProcessFileCompany
columns.description: The company that created the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessFileDescription
columns.description: The description from the version information of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessFileProduct
columns.description: The product name from the version information in the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessFileVersion
columns.description: The product version from the version information of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessIsHidden
columns.description: An indication of whether the parent process is in hidden mode.

columns.name: ParentProcessInjectedAddress
columns.description: The memory address in which the responsible parent process is stored.

columns.name: ParentProcessId
columns.description: The process ID of the parent process.

columns.name: ParentProcessGuid
columns.description: A GUID of the parent process.

columns.name: ParentProcessIntegrityLevel
columns.description: Integrity Level for parent process.

columns.name: ParentProcessMD5
columns.description: The MD5 hash of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessSHA1
columns.description: The SHA-1 hash of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessSHA256
columns.description: The SHA-256 hash of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessSHA512
columns.description: The SHA-512 hash of the parent process image file.

columns.name: ParentProcessIMPHASH
columns.description: The Import Hash of all the library DLLs that are used by the parent process.

columns.name: ParentProcessCreationTime
columns.description: The date and time when the parent process was started.

columns.name: ParentProcessTokenElevation
columns.description: A token indicating the presence or absence of User Access Control (UAC) privilege elevation applied to the parent process.

columns.name: TargetProcessCommandLine
columns.description: The command line used to run the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessName
columns.description: The name of the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileCompany
columns.description: The company that created the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileDescription
columns.description: The description from the version information of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileProduct
columns.description: The product name from the version information in the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileVersion
columns.description: The product version from the version information of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileInternalName
columns.description: The product internal file name from the version information of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileOriginalName
columns.description: The product original file name from the version information of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessFilename
columns.description: The product file name from the version information of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessIsHidden
columns.description: An indication of whether the target process is in hidden mode.

columns.name: TargetProcessInjectedAddress
columns.description: The memory address in which the responsible target process is stored.

columns.name: TargetProcessId
columns.description: The process ID of the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessGuid
columns.description: A GUID of the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessIntegrityLevel
columns.description: Integrity Level for target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessMD5
columns.description: The MD5 hash of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessSHA1
columns.description: The SHA-1 hash of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessSHA256
columns.description: The SHA-256 hash of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessSHA512
columns.description: The SHA-512 hash of the target process image file.

columns.name: TargetProcessIMPHASH
columns.description: The Import Hash of all the library DLLs that are used by the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessCreationTime
columns.description: The date and time when the target process was started.

columns.name: TargetProcessTokenElevation
columns.description: A token indicating the presence or absence of User Access Control (UAC) privilege elevation applied to the target process.

columns.name: TargetProcessFileSize
columns.description: Size of the file in bytes that ran the process responsible for the event.

columns.name: TargetProcessCurrentDirectory
columns.description: The current directory in which the target process is executed.

columns.name: TargetProcessStatusCode
columns.description: The exit code returned by the target process when terminated.

columns.name: RuleName
columns.description: The name or ID of the rule by associated with the inspection results.

columns.name: RuleNumber
columns.description: The number of the rule associated with the inspection results.

columns.name: ThreatId
columns.description: The ID of the threat or malware identified in the activity.

columns.name: ThreatName
columns.description: The name of the threat or malware identified in the activity.

columns.name: ThreatCategory
columns.description: The category of the threat or malware identified in activity.

columns.name: ThreatRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associated with the identified threat. The level should be a number between 0 and 100.

columns.name: ThreatOriginalRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ThreatField
columns.description: The field for which a threat was identified.

columns.name: ThreatConfidence
columns.description: The confidence level of the threat identified, normalized to a value between 0 and a 100.

columns.name: ThreatOriginalConfidence
columns.description: The original confidence level of the threat identified, as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ThreatIsActive
columns.description: True ID the threat identified is considered an active threat.

columns.name: ThreatFirstReportedTime
columns.description: The first time the IP address or domain were identified as a threat.

columns.name: ThreatLastReportedTime
columns.description: The last time the IP address or domain were identified as a threat.
